alert.note: Alert for Fayette; Tuscaloosa; Walker (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 6:29PM CDT until June 29 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Walker County in central Alabama... Northwestern Tuscaloosa County in west central Alabama... Southeastern Fayette County in west central Alabama... * Until 730 PM CDT. * At 629 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Berry, or 12 miles south of Carbon Hill, moving south at 20 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Berry, Boley Springs, Bankston, Whitson, Wiley, Moores Bridge, Windham Springs, Corona, West Corona, Fayette County Public Lake and New Lexington. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
